homeWelcome: Welcome to Houston's favorite Mediterranean restaurant
homeText: At Cuisine With Me, we bring the vibrant flavors and rich traditions of the Mediterranean to your table. Inspired by the sun-kissed shores and diverse cultures of the Mediterranean region, our menu features fresh, locally sourced ingredients, with dishes that celebrate the timeless art of Mediterranean cooking. Whether youâ€™re craving savory seafood, tender meats, or wholesome plant-based options, every meal is crafted with passion and authenticity. Join us for a dining experience that transports you to the heart of the Mediterranean, where every bite tells a story.
aboutLocation: Cuisine With Me, 5152 Mediterranean Ave, Calista
